TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintDocument extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印时，定义一种可重用的可发送到打印机上的对象。

span.span: Defines a reusable object that sends output to a printer, when printing from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，您创建类的一个实例 ，设置和等属性 ，然后调用 方法来开始打印进程。Typically, you create an instance of the class, set properties such as the and , and call the method to start the printing process. 通过使用 的 属性处理 事件，您在该事件中指定要打印的输出。Handle the event where you specify the output to print, by using the property of the . 有关从 Windows 窗体应用程序进行打印的详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体打印支持](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/windows-forms-print-support)。For more information about printing from a Windows Form application, see the [Windows Forms Print Support](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/windows-forms-print-support). 如果要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序进行打印，请参阅 命名空间。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在默认打印机上打印名为 C:\My Documents\MyFile.txt 的文件。The following code example prints the file named C:\My Documents\MyFile.txt on the default printer. 若要运行该示例，请创建新的 Windows 窗体项目并将示例代码粘贴到窗体中，并替换文件内容。To run the example, create a new Windows Forms project and paste the example code into the form, replacing the file contents. 对于 c #，你将需要删除 Form1.Designer.cs 文件。For C#, you will need to delete the Form1.Designer.cs file. 同时，更改要打印的文件的路径。Also, change the path to the file you want to print. > [!NOTE] > 该示例要求每行均适合页面宽度。The example requires that each line fits within the page width. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：打印 Windows 窗体中的多页文本文件

span.span: How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数根据默认打印机初始化所有字段。The parameterless constructor initializes all fields based upon the default printer. 通常，在创建新的后， 将分别设置影响通过和属性的输出的打印机和页面设置 。Typically, after creating a new , you set printer and page settings that affect the output through the and properties, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将文档的页面方向设置为横向，并打印文档。The following code example sets a document's page orientation to landscape, and prints the document. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BeginPrint As PrintEventHandler

summary.span: 在调用 方法之后、打印文档首页之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called and before the first page of the document prints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，您可以处理 事件，以便初始化打印过程中使用的字体、文件流和其他资源。Typically, you handle the event to initialize fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将委托的实例添加 到事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每当发生事件时，就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 有关用委托处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

summary.span: 获取或设置用作要打印的所有页的默认设置的页设置。

span.span: Gets or sets page settings that are used as defaults for all pages to be printed.

value.span: 为文档指定默认页设置的 。

span.span: A that specifies the default page settings for the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过属性指定多个默认页面设置 。You can specify several default page settings through the property. 例如， 属性指定是否以彩色打印页面， 属性指定横向或纵向方向， 属性指定页面的边距。For example, the property specifies whether the page prints in color, the property specifies landscape or portrait orientation, and the property specifies the margins of the page. 若要逐页指定设置，请 分别处理或 事件，并修改 或中包含的参数 。To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the or event and modify the argument included in the or , respectively. > [!NOTE] > 开始打印后，通过属性对页面设置的更改 将不会影响要打印的页面。After printing has started, changes to page settings through the property will not affect pages being printed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将文档的页面方向设置为横向，并打印文档。The following code example sets a document's page orientation to landscape, and prints the document. 该示例进行了三个假设：已将一个名为的变量 `filePath` 设置为要打印的文件的路径; 已经定义了一个名为的方法，该方法 `pd_PrintPage` 处理 事件，并已将名为的变量 `printer` 设置为打印机的名称。The example makes three assumptions: that a variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print; that a method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined; and that a variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 在 此示例中使用、 和 命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置打印文档时要显示的文档名称（例如，在打印状态对话框或打印机队列中）。

span.span: Gets or sets the document name to display (for example, in a print status dialog box or printer queue) while printing the document.

value.span: 打印文档时要显示的文档名。

span.span: The document name to display while printing the document.
The default is "document".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性未指定要打印的文件。The property does not specify the file to print. 而是通过处理事件来指定要打印的输出 。Rather, you specify the output to print by handling the event. 有关示例，请参阅 类概述。For an example, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用颜色打印第一页，如果打印机支持该文档，并将设置 为用户友好名称。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it, and sets the to a user-friendly name. 该示例需要创建一个 名为的变量 `printDoc` ，并 处理和事件。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. 在 此示例中使用和命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event EndPrint As PrintEventHandler

summary.span: 打印完文档的最后一页时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the last page of the document has printed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，你可以处理 事件，以释放打印过程中使用的字体、文件流和其他资源，如字体。Typically, you handle the event to release fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process, like fonts. 通过 在事件中将属性设置为，可以指示没有更多的页可供打印 `false` 。You indicate that there are no more pages to print by setting the property to `false` in the event. 如果打印进程被取消或在打印过程中发生异常，也会发生此事件。The event also occurs if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将委托的实例添加 到事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每当发生事件时，就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 有关用委托处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

summary.span: 该事件在调用 方法之后并在打印文档的第一页之前被调用。

span.span: It is called after the method is called and before the first page of the document prints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许派生类在不附加委托的情况下处理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 当派生类调用方法时 ，它 通过委托调用事件处理程序来引发事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 此方法是初始化的好地方。

span.span: This method is a good place for initialization.

abstract member OnEndPrint : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs -> unit override this.OnEndPrint : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs -> unit
protected internal virtual void OnEndPrint (System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnEndPrint(class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnEndPrint (e As PrintEventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许派生类在不附加委托的情况下处理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 如果打印进程被取消或在打印过程中发生异常，也会调用方法。The method is also called if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process. 当派生类调用方法时 ，它 通过委托调用事件处理程序来引发事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 此方法是取消初始化的好地方。

span.span: This method is a good place for uninitialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 当派生类调用方法时 ，它 通过委托调用事件处理程序来引发事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与页关联的图形对象的位置是位于用户指定边距内，还是位于该页可打印区域的左上角。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the position of a graphics object associated with a page is located just inside the user-specified margins or at the top-left corner of the printable area of the page.

value.span: 如果图形起始于页面边距，则为 ；如果图形原点位于该页可打印区域的左上角，则为 。

span.span: if the graphics origin starts at the page margins; if the graphics origin is at the top-left corner of the printable page.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算可用于打印的区域需要知道纸张的物理大小、页面的边距和 对象原点的位置。Calculating the area available to print requires knowing the physical size of the paper, the margins for the page, and the location of the object origin. 当 为时 `true` ， 对象位置会考虑 属性值和页面的可打印区域。When is `true`, the object location takes into account the property value and the printable area of the page. 如果 为 `false` ，则仅使用页面的可打印区域来确定 对象原点的位置， 该值将被忽略。When is `false`, only the printable area of the page is used to determine the location of the object origin, the value is ignored. 例如，如果 为 `true` ，并且 每一侧的都设置为1英寸，则 中包含的对象 将位于页面左侧和顶部的1英寸位置。For example, if is `true`, and is set for 1 inch on each side, the object included in the is located 1 inch from the left and top of the page. 如果页面的可打印区域在每一端分别为 .25 英寸，并且 为 `false` ，则该 对象从页面的左边缘到页面顶部 .25 英寸。If the printable area of the page is .25 of an inch on each side and is `false`, the object is located .25 of an inch from the left and top of the page. > [!NOTE] > 页面的可打印区域因打印机而异，不保证其对称。The printable area of a page varies from printer to printer and is not guaranteed to be symmetrical.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Print() cil managed

summary.span: 开始文档的打印进程。

span.span: Starts the document's printing process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过处理 事件并使用中包含的来指定要打印的输出 。Specify the output to print by handling the event and by using the included in the . 使用 属性指定应打印文档的打印机。Use the property to specify which printer should print the document. 方法无需使用打印对话框即可打印文档。The method prints the document without using a print dialog. 当你希望为用户提供选择打印设置的功能时，请使用。Use a when you want to offer the user the ability to choose print settings. > [!NOTE] > 如果在打印过程中未由方法处理的异常，则将 中止文档打印。If an exception that is not handled by the method is thrown during printing, the printing of the document is aborted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将通过命令行指定的文件打印到默认打印机。The following code example prints the file that is specified through the command line to the default printer. > [!NOTE] > 该示例要求每行均适合页面宽度。The example requires that each line fits within the page width. 在 此示例中，使用、、、 和 命名空间。Use the , , , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 属性中命名的打印机不存在。

span.span: The printer named in the property does not exist.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Printing::PrintController ^ PrintController { System::Drawing::Printing::PrintController ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Printing::PrintController ^ value); };
member this.PrintController : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指导打印进程的打印控制器。

span.span: Gets or sets the print controller that guides the printing process.
The that guides the printing process.

value.span: 默认情况下为 类的一个新实例。

span.span: The default is a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打印控制器通过多种方式引导打印过程。A print controller guides the printing process in several ways. 例如，若要打印文档，需要将其转换为 对象。For example, to print a document, you need to convert it to a object. 指定在图像中绘制打印预览或打印图像的图形的位置，以实际打印文档。A specifies where to draw the graphic in an image for a print preview or on a printer to actually print the document. 打印控制器还可以指定是立即打印文档，还是等待指定的时间间隔。A print controller can also specify whether to print a document immediately, or wait a specified interval. ## Examples 下面的代码示例要求您已经创建了一个 名为的类的实例 `myPrintDocument` 。The following code example requires that you have created an instance of the class that is named `myPrintDocument`. 该示例创建类的新实例 ，将其分配给的 属性 `myPrintDocument` ，然后打印文档。The example creates a new instance of the class, assigns it to the property of `myPrintDocument`, and prints the document. 在 此示例中使用和命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置对文档进行打印的打印机。

span.span: Gets or sets the printer that prints the document.

value.span: ，它指定在何处以及如何打印文档。

span.span: A that specifies where and how the document is printed.

value.span: 默认为 ，其属性均设置为默认值。

span.span: The default is a with its properties set to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过属性指定多个打印机设置 。You can specify several printer settings through the property. 例如，使用 属性指定要打印的份数，指定要 使用的打印机的属性，以及 指定要打印的页面范围的属性。For example, use the property to specify the number of copies you want to print, the property to specify the printer to use, and the property to specify the range of pages you want to print. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在指定的打印机上打印文档。The following code example prints a document on the specified printer. 该示例进行了以下三个假设：已 `filePath` 将变量名称设置为要打印的文件的路径; 已定义了一个名为的方法，该方法 `pd_PrintPage` 处理 事件，并已将名为的变量 `printer` 设置为打印机的名称。The example makes three assumptions: that a variable names `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print; that a method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined; and that a variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 在 此示例中使用、 和 命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PrintPage As PrintPageEventHandler

summary.span: 当需要为当前页打印的输出时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the output to print for the current page is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定要打印的输出，请使用 的 属性。To specify the output to print, use the property of the . 例如，若要指定应打印的文本行，请使用方法绘制文本 。For example, to specify a line of text that should be printed, draw the text using the method. 除了指定输出之外，还可以通过将属性设置为来指示是否有要打印的附加页面 `true` 。In addition to specifying the output, you can indicate if there are additional pages to print by setting the property to `true`. 默认值为 `false` ，指示没有要打印的页面。The default is `false`, which indicates that there are no more pages to print. 还可以通过修改各个页面设置 ，通过将属性设置为可取消打印作业 `true` 。Individual page settings can also be modified through the and the print job can be canceled by setting the property to `true`. 若要使用不同的页面设置打印文档的每一页，请处理 事件。To print each page of a document using different page settings, handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将委托的实例添加 到事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每当发生事件时，就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 有关用委托处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates handling the event. 有关其他示例，请参阅 [如何：在 Windows 窗体中打印多页文本文件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms)。For another example, see [How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms). [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：打印 Windows 窗体中的多页文本文件

span.span: How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms
Windows Forms Print Support

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryPageSettings As QueryPageSettingsEventHandler

summary.span: 在 事件的紧面前发生。

span.span: Occurs immediately before each event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用不同的页面设置打印文档的每一页。It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings. 通过修改属性的各个属性 或通过将属性设置为来设置页面设置 。You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the property or by setting the property to a . 对所做的更改 仅影响当前页面，而不影响文档的默认页面设置。Changes made to the affect only the current page, not the document's default page settings. 还可以通过将的 属性设置为来取消打印作业 `true` 。The print job can also be canceled by setting the property to `true` for the . 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将委托的实例添加 到事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每当发生事件时，就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 有关用委托处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 如果使用 事件修改打印机设置，则 即使设置了优化配置开关，控件的性能也不会提高。If you use the event to modify printer settings, the performance of the control will not improve even if an optimization configuration switch is set. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PrintPreviewDialog 控件概述](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/printpreviewdialog-control-overview-windows-forms)。For more information, see [PrintPreviewDialog control overview](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/printpreviewdialog-control-overview-windows-forms). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用颜色打印第一页，如果打印机支持该文档。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it. 该示例需要创建一个 名为的变量 `printDoc` ，并 处理和事件。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. `currentPageNumber`在事件中打印每个页面后，该变量会递增 ，这不会显示。The `currentPageNumber` variable is incremented after every page is printed in the event, which is not shown. 在 此示例中使用和命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#6)]

summary.span: 以字符串形式提供有关打印文档的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the print document, in string form.
A string.
